ddb-importer-demo.image-upload-directory: Specifies the image upload location on the server.
ddb-importer-demo.scene-upload-directory: Specifies the scene upload location on the server.
Location where the module will look for adventure data files to import
Location where the module will upload adventure images and data
ddb-importer-demo.adventure-misc-path.hi: Location where the module will upload misc adventure e.g. icons, this should not be an S3 location
ddb-importer-demo.entity-import-policy.h: Defines if imported items should be saved into the compendiums below, and under which circumstances.
ddb-importer-demo.entity-import-policy.0: Save all entities, overwrite existing ones
ddb-importer-demo.entity-import-policy.1: Save new entities only, do not overwrite existing ones
ddb-importer-demo.entity-import-policy.2: Do not save the entities at all
When saving imports to compendiums, you can decide if you want to clean up the entities from the current world or keep them
Keep all entities in the world
ddb-importer-demo.entity-feature-compend: Class features compendium for imported features
ddb-importer-demo.entity-trait-compendiu: Racial trait compendium for imported racial traits
ddb-importer-demo.entity-item-spell-comp: Target compendium for imported spells belonging to magic items
ddb-importer-demo.entity-monster-feature: Target compendium for imported monster features
ddb-importer-demo.log-level.name: Log Level
ddb-importer-demo.log-level.hint: The level of console log statements that should be displayed in the console.
ddb-importer-demo.allow-scene-download.h: If you wish to submit data for walls and lighting of a scene use this option to download a config file for submission.
ddb-importer-demo.scene-format.name: Scene image format
ddb-importer-demo.scene-format.hint: Sets the scene image format. WEBP is recommended due to smaller file size and faster loading speeds.
ddb-importer-demo.custom-proxy.name: Use a custom proxy?
ddb-importer-demo.custom-proxy.hint: Tick if using a custom proxy and enter the proxy URL's below
ddb-importer-demo.cobalt-cookie.name: DDB Cobalt Cookie
ddb-importer-demo.cobalt-cookie.hint: You can get this using my Chrome extension https://github.com/MrPrimate/ddb-importer-demo-chrome
ddb-importer-demo.campaign-id.name: DDB Campaign URL or ID
ddb-importer-demo.campaign-id.hint: Enter the campaign URL or ID, e.g. https://www.dndbeyond.com/campaigns/12345 or 12345
ddb-importer-demo.beta-key.name: Patreon supporter Beta Key
ddb-importer-demo.beta-key.hint: Some Patreon supporter tiers have access to Beta features, enter your key here
ddb-importer-demo.auto-create-compendium: Auto create compendiums if not present?
Auto create compendiums if not present?
ddb-importer-demo.use-full-source.name: Use full source book name?
ddb-importer-demo.monster-has-vision.nam: Should imported monster have vision set?
ddb-importer-demo.monster-has-vision.hin: If unticked monsters will not have vision set
ddb-importer-demo.restrict-to-trusted.hi: Restrict character import to Trusted Users
ddb-importer-demo.allow-all-sync.name: Allow all users to sync to DDB
ddb-importer-demo.allow-all-sync.hint: If character import is restricted, this option will still allow players to sync back to DDB.
ddb-importer-demo.setup.name: Core setup
ddb-importer-demo.compendium-setup.name: Compendiums
ddb-importer-demo.dynamic-update-setup.h: Push character updates straight back to D&D Beyond!
ddb-importer-demo.monster-link-title.nam: Monster D&D Beyond link in title bar?
ddb-importer-demo.monster-link-title.hin: Otherwise it's a button next to the name. (Reload to take effect).
ddb-importer-demo.character-link-title.n: Character ddb-importer-demo button in title bar?
ddb-importer-demo.character-link-title.h: Otherwise it's a button next to the name. (Reload to take effect).
ddb-importer-demo.link-title-colour-whit: Default is Red. Reload to take effect.
ddb-importer-demo.use-damage-hints.name: Use damage type hints?
ddb-importer-demo.use-damage-hints.hint: When building damage strings e.g. 1d6[healing]. Useful for MidiQOL etc.
ddb-importer-demo.add-damage-restriction: If a damage restriction is in place, add this to the damage hint
ddb-importer-demo.show-munch-top.name: Munch button be at the top?
ddb-importer-demo.munching-selection-com: If using compendium folders, what kind of folders do you want the muncher to create?
If using compendium folders, what kind of folders do you want the muncher to create?
If using compendium folders, what kind of folders do you want the muncher to create?
ddb-importer-demo.embed-macros.name: Embed macros in items?
ddb-importer-demo.embed-macros.hint: Embed macros into items? If not selected, item macro will call DDB Importer to generate and run the appropriate macro on the fly. Advantages: don't need to remunch spells to get macro, less data stored in world. Disadvantages: harder to debug, need to be running DDB Importer.
Show the show image to players button?
In journals provide hover-over button to show image to players? (Reload required)
